onChange.script:
import traceback
	try:
		if currentValue.value:
			#system.perspective.print(currentValue)
			valid = True
			#Verify its greater then -1
			if self.custom.edit_data.selected_id < 0:
				valid = False
				system.perspective.print('Participant ID not valid')
			#Verify the ID doesn't already exist in the list
			for row in range(len(self.custom.edit_data.selected_id_list)):
				if self.custom.edit_data.selected_id_list[row] == self.custom.edit_data.selected_id:
					valid = False
					system.perspective.print('Duplicate Participant ID')
			if valid:
				system.perspective.print('Valid')		
				self.custom.edit_data.selected_id_list.append(self.custom.edit_data.selected_id)
				self.custom.edit_data.selected_participants.append(self.custom.edit_data.search_selection[0])
			#Reset the script trigger
			self.custom.func_add_participant = False
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants ServciesBatchEdit view.custom.func_add_participant")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

config.script:
import traceback
	try:
		#system.perspective.print("New Batch Services Button Pressed")
		#Reset all the data entry fields
		self.view.custom.edit_data.time_created = system.date.now()
		self.view.custom.edit_data.program_id = -1
		self.view.custom.edit_data.selected_id_list = []
		self.view.custom.edit_data.selected_participants = []
		#Send the message to refresh the table
		messageType = 'RefreshBatchWaitlistSearch'
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
		messageType = 'ResetWaitlistSearch'
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants WaitListBatch button_new")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

import traceback
	try:
		project = "RITI"
		### Declare parameters 
		time_created = system.date.now()
		program_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.program_id
		comment = self.view.custom.edit_data.comment
	
		## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
		if (time_created is None):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Date Error")
		elif (program_id is None) or (int(program_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Program ID Error")
		else:
			valid = True
			system.perspective.print("Batch Waitlist Data Valid")
		
		### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
		if valid:
			#system.perspective.print("Insert New Batch Data")
			path = "Shelter/WaitList/AddToWaitList"
			for row in range(len(self.view.custom.edit_data.selected_id_list)):
				### Batch jobs only create new data
				participant_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.selected_id_list[row]
				parameters = {"dateadded":time_created,"participantid":participant_id,
							"programid":program_id,	"notes":comment}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)		
				#system.perspective.print("Insert data")
			
			##### Refresh the table
			if Refresh:
				system.perspective.print("Batch Services Query Success")
				#Reset all the data entry fields
				#Reset all the data entry fields
				self.view.custom.edit_data.time_created = system.date.now()
				self.view.custom.edit_data.program_id = -1
				self.view.custom.edit_data.selected_id_list = []
				self.view.custom.edit_data.selected_participants = []
				#Send the message to refresh the table
				messageType = 'RefreshBatchWaitlistSearch'
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
				messageType = 'ResetWaitlistSearch'
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
		
		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.")
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants WaitlistBatchEdit button_save")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

props.text: Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False
